data.text:
Really one of the best hotels, and food is good and rooms are great.
 Marina Sharm Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh is known for its picturesque location overlooking the Red Sea. The hotel offers a range of amenities including spacious rooms, multiple swimming pools, a private beach area, and various dining options. Guests often praise the hotel's friendly staff and excellent customer service. However, some reviews have mentioned that the hotel could benefit from updates to its facilities and furnishings. Overall, the Marina Sharm Hotel is a popular choice for those seeking a relaxing beachfront getaway in Sharm El Sheikh.
i like to thank you all the animation team for them work hard to entertain us and make our vacation.
data.title: BEST HOTEL

data.text: Im here with my friends. We have a very good time. The beach is very . We like the food and rooms were clean. We have a one time dinner at Italian restaurant. The pizza taste was very good. Next time I will come with family. Animators make a show every day. There were dance, belly dance and very good clubs
data.title: Good time

data.text: I was at Marina Sharm hotel with my friends, We celebrate my birthday, My friends make a surprise for me and hotel give a cake, The food is good, rooms clean and new, There are 5 pools. Next time I will come with my family. At the evening animation team makes a show. There were belly dance tanura, Then we go club and have good time
data.title: good animation

data.text:
Wonderfull place very clean rooms amazing stuff very helpful specially Amigo and the beach very nice I will visit the place again very beautiful.location.
The food is fresh in 1 minute you can catch naama souk where you can find all your needs pubs and cafe

data.text:
The stuff is amazing and they do their job perfectly. The food is great. The location of the hotel is also a great reason to come here, because there are so many places near to the hotel to visit, without taxi but just on foot. 
The only con for me is that the beach area closes too soon, and you canâ€™t even sit in front of the shore at night (which is my favorite thing to do)
data.title: Egypt in spring
